name: Aqua Lucerna
description:
In the far future, humanity has retreated to the ocean's depths from a hostile world. 
A machine critical to support life has been shut down, you are sent to investigate.
Find the equipment necessary to restore functionality and search for clues to find out what happened at the facility.

Features two endings.

Currently not available for the itch.io app, please download and run the .exe!

This was originally made for Global Game Jam 2023, but we ran out of time. We  continued working on it for about a month to polish it up. Inspired by classic horror titles like Resident Evil (1996).

PC CONTROLS
W - Move Forward
A - Turn Left
S - Turn Right
D - Move Backward
Left Shift (Hold) - Run while moving
E - Use / Inspect / Accept
Left Control (Hold) - Ready  Weapon
Space - Fire Weapon
Tab - Inventory
Escape - Menu / Pause

XBOX CONTROLS
D-Pad - Movement
X (Hold) - Run while moving
A - Use / Inspect / Accept /  Fire Weapon
Right Bumper (Hold) - Ready  Weapon
Y - Inventory
B / Start - Menu / Pause
